title: On Creative Blocks, Procrastination, and 7 Useful Tips
description:
Procrastination and creative blocks can turn something meaningful into something painful. Here is a brief discussion on overcoming those barriers and 7 tips that will address both.

Cal Newport: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3E7hkPZ-HTk
https://www.npr.org/2019/08/26/754336716/you-2-0-deep-work

Link to my blog: https://wordpress.com/post/aqualityexistence.com/117
